Name: King of the Couch: Zoovival
About the game: The game Nature is harsh. Only the most adapted will survive. Following a thorough study of nature, Loophole Interactive is proud to bring you King of the Couch: Zoovival! Take up the role as one of nature's toughest zoovivors as they battle it out using tools commonly found in nature, such as a black hole gun. Save yourself from a cheese wheel running amok by swinging yourself to safety using a grappling hook. Chug baguettes at your friends under the wrathful eyes of a pissed of volcano. All part of natural selection! Features: 2D battle platformer with 3D graphics Up to 4 players versus eachother Use a grappling hook to move around Lots of funky weapons commonly found in nature All-natural, realistic weapon-classes Play as a bear, a fish, a frog, chicken, penguin, toothless t-rex, or a sewing lady Various arenas with game-changing mechanics
